section.title: Apache Forrest - Text Plugin
section.p: This plugin allows Forrest files to be output as simple text.

section.title: How to Use the Text Plugin
section.p: The plugin needs to be incorporated into your existing build of Forrest. To do this,

ol.li: At this point, you'll be asked the name of the plugin to deploy. The name of this plugin is text-output

section.p: Once you have the text plugin installed, it is simply a case of requesting a file with an txt extension. For example, this page as text.
